channel.title: The Easiest Script Request!
channel.description: Just find one of these colours: 10485759, 10527138,8160396 and click twice. There should be about a .5-1 second wait between the two clicks.

item.title: The Easiest Script Request!
item.dc:creator: @RsNewb RsNewb
item.description:
@RsNewb wrote:

Hey Ron, when i try to run it, it doesnt work >_<

Read full topic

item.title: The Easiest Script Request!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Something like this?

Program WeirdoScript;

Const
     Color1 = 10485759; // Color1 of whatever.
     Color2 = 10527138; // Color2 of whatever.
     Color3 = 8160396;  // Color3 of whatever.

Var
   x, y : Integer;

Procedure ClickColor(color : Integer);
Begin
     If (FindColor(x, y, color, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000)) Then
     Begin
          MoveMouseSmooth(x, y);
          ClickMouse(x, y, true);
          Wait(20+Random(50));
          ClickMouse(x, y, true);
     End;
End;

Procedure ClickLoop;
Begin
     ClickColor(color1);
     ClickColor(color2);
     ClickColor(color3);
End;

Begin
     Repeat
           ClickLoop;
     Until(False)
End.

~Ron

Read full topic
